overview: Mixing campy comedy with sizzling sex, Gino Colbert serves up the hottest feature of the year with SUNSEX BLVD. Steve Regis palys Dez Norman, a retired pornstar that decides that while the screen may have gotten smaller, he certainly hasn't. One hot encounter follows another, culminating in the ultimate comeback. So take a trip down Sunsex Blvd. You may never want to come back.
title: Sunsex Blvd
